SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_WEB_SPONSORED_CHILDREN_FROMITEMLISTXML
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets sponsored children for sponsor from add customizations to web sponsorships form.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_WEB_SPONSORED_CHILDREN_FROMITEMLISTXML ( @ITEMLISTXML XML ) returns table as return ( -- do work here and return a value SELECT T.c.value ('(ID)[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') AS 'ID', T.c.value ('(NAME)[1]', 'nvarchar(50)') AS 'ChildName', T.c.value ('(LOOKUPID)[1]', 'nvarchar(7)') as 'LookupId', T.c.value ('(SPONSORSHIPDATE)[1]', 'date') as 'StartDate', T.c.value ('(SPONSORSHIPID)[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') as 'SponsorshipId' FROM @ITEMLISTXML.nodes ('/CHILDREN/ITEM') T (c) )
